thread.title: Now THAT'S living like a celebrity! Emily Blunt's $2.5million Hollywood Hills home is now available to rent on Airbnb
thread.title_full: Now THAT'S living like a celebrity! Emily Blunt's $2.5million Hollywood Hills home is now available to rent on Airbnb | Daily Mail Online

author: Katie Amey for MailOnline
title: Now THAT'S living like a celebrity! Emily Blunt's $2.5million Hollywood Hills home is now available to rent on Airbnb
text:
View
comments
Ever wondered what living like a celebrity really means?
Well, now you have your chance to truly stay where the stars stay. Or, in this case, where they used to stay.
Hollywood A-listers Emily Blunt and John Krasinski have recently moved out of their sprawling Los Angeles home - and it's now up for rent on Airbnb for just £400 per night.
Emily Blunt's former Hollywood Hills home is now available to rent on Airbnb - for just £400 per night
The Hollywood Hills home is an incredible 3,000 square feet and comes complete with a huge living room, eat in kitchen and six large bedrooms.
The single storey house also boasts three bathrooms, a huge patio and a jacuzzi hot tub.
 Newcastle named the UK's best airport for the third year in... Plane forced into emergency landing after unclaimed... Chinese airline offering 'supermoon viewing' flights for two... named top-rated property according to... Situated in one of the area's most sought after streets, the gated compound is located on a bluff with dramatic views of the City of Angels below.
Plus, French doors in every room open to plenty of hidden patios and courtyards in this truly one-of-a-kind property.
The 3,000 square foot compound is in an ideal location - on a bluff with dramatic views of Hollywood below
The single storey home has six bedrooms and three large bathrooms, all decorated in romantic hues
The dark wood accents add an opulent touch to the property, which the actress bought for $2.575 million
Anyone who stays in Emily's former home will have use of brand new duvets, towels, pillows and linens
Inside, dark hardwood floors add a romantic feel, while art deco chandeliers and antique furniture offer slightly more edge.
Anyone who books in with Airbnb will also have use of brand new duvets, towels and pillows, as well as Egyptian cotton bed linens.
The British actress and her husband of five years first moved into the $2.575 million (£1,688,552) home in 2014, but now, after having their first child, it seems they're eager for even more space.
Well you know what they say? Their loss, our gain.
Emily purchased the home with her husband, actor John Krasinksi, in 2014 - but they've recently moved out
Almost every room is filled with light thanks to the French doors, which open onto a sprawling patio
There are also plenty of hidden terraces and courtyards off each room in this A-list house
Read more: www.airbnb.co.uk...
